page.title: 11Derbyshire Miners Centre
page.content: When we arrived at the gate the Security Officer directed us to the Office Manager.After asking her questions about the facilities at the Centre,we walked round counting all the different amenities,such as shops, arcades,bingo halls,pools,etc. On the way back,we passed people sitting in deck chairs enjoying the sun and noticed the theatre and cinema where church services are held on Sundays. We also saw 2 large buildings,one of which was a paraplegic unit with special facilities.The other was the convalescent home mostly used by miners.Each week at the beginning and end of the summer they cater for visitors such as Senior Citizens and members of the St. Johns Ambulance Brigade.At the height of the season the chalets and luxury flats are occupied by families from mining areas
